title: Silver Jeans Co. Men's Eddie Athletic Fit Tapered Leg Jeans
description: DISTINCTIVE DENIM. Our Men's Eddie Athletic Fit Tapered Leg Jeans feature 5-pocket styling with a zip fly and button closure. They're tapered to perfection for an active lifestyle.

MOVE HOW YOU LIKE. With an athletic fit that's roomy and comfortable, these jeans won't hinder your range of motion. Rise: Sits at the waist with a classic athletic hip and thigh; Inseam: 30/32/34/36" inseams; Leg Opening: 15"

TIMELESS APPEAL. Eddie is the ultimate fit for athletic builds, featuring a classic and roomy athletic fit through the hip and thigh. It sits at the waist with a longer saddle for extra room and added comfort.
ALL DAY STYLE. These jeans are made from a premium cotton blend for a durable finish and great fit that holds up all day long. Whether for work, or weekends these are pants that'll get the job done.
EVERYDAY COOL. These bottoms for men feature our signature small "S" scroll at the back pockets for understated style that's practical and made to fit your lifestyle.

Silver Jeans Co. Eddie Athletic Fit Tapered Leg Jeans - Eddie is the ultimate fit for athletic builds, featuring a classic and roomy athletic fit through the hip and thigh. It sits at the waist with a longer saddle for extra room and added comfort. The classic athletic fit in the thigh area tapers to a 15” leg opening with a close-cut finish.
